official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the support and encouragement of the Congress for those fighting for freedom and against communism in Angola.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the cause of the Angolan patriots is the cause of freedom and the Congress supports their courageous stand. Declares that the Congress looks forward to the withdrawal of all foreign troops from Angola and to national independence, human rights, and freedom for all Angolans.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the support and encouragement of the Congress for those fighting for freedom and against communism in Angola.
